name: Invasion of the Inevitable Spacerocks from Outerspace
name_original: Invasion of the Inevitable Spacerocks from Outerspace
description:
'Invasion of the Inevitable Spacerocks from Outerspace' is an entry submitted for Ludum Dare 50 - A game made in a weekend, by a team of two.

You play as the last defender of a weirdly scaled planet and must defend it, for as long as you can against an infinite swarm of space rocks.
